expectations.text: An updated AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The original content is preserved — the Architecture, Tech stack, and Development sections still exist
expectations.evidence: All original sections intact in same order with same content

expectations.text: The file documents the Redis connection pool leak issue — mentioning redis.quit() and test teardown
expectations.evidence: Both inline under Test ('Always call redis.quit() in test teardown') and in Gotchas section with expanded detail

expectations.text: The file documents the task_assignments DB trigger that syncs to search_index
expectations.evidence: Gotchas: 'task_assignments table trigger... Direct SQL inserts bypass this trigger. Always use Prisma'

expectations.text: The update is additive — not a rewrite
